newsitem.title: USA: Alpha to record one-time gain on unit sale.
newsitem.headline: Alpha to record one-time gain on unit sale.

text.p: Alpha Technologies Group Inc said Friday it expects to report an after tax gain of about $600,000 on the sale its Connector Industries of America unit for up to $2.5 million.

The company also said its Uni-Star Industries subsidiary, which sold the Connector Industries unit, expects to eliminate about $700,000 in annual expenses by cutting its staff and taking other steps at its Malco division.
The company said it expects a one-time charge of about $140,000 in connection with this reduction.
The company said the Connector Industries sale includes $2.1 million payable in cash, a contingent payment of up to $400,000 plus the assumption of certain payables and liabilities of about $134,000.
Proceeds of the sale will be used to reduce debt and increase working capital.
